title: Steel Partners: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
title_page: Steel Partners: Q2 Earnings Snapshot | AP News
maintext:
NEW YORK (AP) _ Steel Partners Holdings LP (SPLP) on Friday reported earnings of $92.1 million in its second quarter.
On a per-share basis, the New York-based company said it had profit of $3.52. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring gains, were $1.03 per share.
The diversified industrial company posted revenue of $441.4 million in the period.
_____
